name: Controlling the misinformation diffusion in social media by the effect of different classes of agents
keywords: Agent-Based Modelling - Software engineering - Information Systems and Social Networks
description: An agent-based framework to simulate the diffusion process of a piece of misinformation according to the SBFC model in which the fake news and its debunking compete in a social network. Considering new classes of agents, this model is closer to reality and proposed different strategies how to mitigate and control misinformation.
releaseNotes:
The final version published in CSS 2023 "Controlling the misinformation diffusion in social media by the effect of different classes of agents".
